text: Erigeron altaicus is an Asian species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to Siberia, Kazakhstan, and Xinjiang.Tropicos, Erigeron altaicus Popov. Erigeron altaicus is a perennial, clump-forming herb up to 50 cm (20 inches) tall. Its flower heads have lilac ray florets surrounding yellow disc florets.Flora of China, Erigeron altaicus Popov, 1940. 阿尔泰飞蓬 a er tai fei peng ==References== altaicus Category:Flora of Asia Category:Plants described in 1940
title: Erigeron altaicus
